title: (x) Heart symbol - custom heart shape in Adobe Illustrator/Photoshop {Scott Hultman}
content:
This is probably a very easy one, but does anyone know which font makes this heart?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141018045544im_/http:/typophile.com/files/heart_4914.jpg)
author: zap_rowsdower

comments.content:
Hi Zap,

I’m not sure if this has to be a font …  
 [Zapf Dingbats](http://web.archive.org/web/20141018045544/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/elsner_flake/zapf_dingbats_no_2_ot/) feature some hearts, but they’re no cigar.  
The letters are Cooper Black, btw.  
F
I think it looks like the custom heart shape in Ilustrator/Photoshop

Thank you both for your help.

sch2525, you are correct.  
Thanks for your assistance.
You can find it in the "Creative Symbol Collection" or were you testing us since you know that sch2525 was correct?
Nah, I think he checked it and then confirmed in the thread that it was indeed what he was looking for.
